Title: Richard Jewell
Writer: Billy Ray, Marie Brenner (based upon the article "American Nightmare: The Ballad of Richard Jewell" by), Kent Alexander (based upon the book "The Suspect" by), Kevin Salwen (based upon the book "The Suspect" by)
Actors: Paul Walter Hauser, Sam Rockwell, Brandon Stanley, Ryan Boz
Plot: Security guard Richard Jewell is an instant hero after foiling a bomb attack at the 1996 Atlanta Olympics, but his life becomes a nightmare when the FBI leaks to the media that he is a suspect in the case.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 18 nominations.
